wikipedia_page.main: Derrick O'Clancy White was a writer and political activist originally from Dublin who was a parliamentary candidate initially for the Scottish National Party and then latterly for the Scottish Socialist Party in the Lothians.

response: * Derrick White, writer and Scottish socialist
His youngest son, Derrick White, went to become a prominent member of the Scottish National Party and later the Scottish Socialist Party.
*Derrick White (politician) (1942–2007), writer and political activist from Dublin
